ing: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, or as needed
des: "Yummy salami, onion,and cream cheese roll ups for an appetizer or a party! Secure the roll ups with toothpicks, and cut them into bite size pieces. Sometimes I make different versions, so I can have a platter that includes roll-ups with onions and pickles. Something for everyone! You can use pickles in place of green onions, if desired."
ins: Lay salami slices on a plate and spread cream cheese on each. Place 1 green onion at the end of each piece of salami and roll salami around onion; secure with a toothpick.
